description: An all-day pant that offers a unique combination of performance and style. Backpacker gave the AP™ Pant its Editor's Choice Award, and you'll see why. Made from a twill fabric that's comfortable, durable, and has excellent stretch, it's known for its incomparable fit and versatility.
name: Mountain Hardwear Hardwear AP Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Peached Woven - 75% Cotton, 22% Nylon, 3% Lycra® Elastane - 203 g
